ul.li: Gïelese: learn South Saami words. Audiofiles and photos.
OAHPA-åarjel - Interaktiiviset ohjelmat, joilla voit harjoitella sanoja ja kielioppia
Gïelebaalkan mietie - læringsstier for studenter som lærer seg sørsamisk, men de kan passe for andre også. Lydfiler og linker til øvelser.
Sanojen taivutusparadigmat - Tietokone antaa haluamasi sananan taivutusparadigma

Nedtedigibaakoeh: Saami-Norwegian and Norwegian-Saami online dictionary
Understands inflected words
Offers inflection paradigms.
Linked to corpus search.
With a bookmarklet: click a word in a text to get it translated.

Webdict: Saami-Norwegian and Norwegian-Saami online dictionary.
The words are presented as a list, which can be useful if you don't know how to spell the word.
Only baseforms.
